snippet: The victims were two drivers, two guards and five staff members of the Czech charity People in Need, the group’s country director said.
abstract: Officials say gunmen attack Czech aid agency in northern Afghanistan, killing nine workers before escaping.

byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and JAWAD SUKHANYAR

lead_paragraph: The victims were two drivers, two guards and five staff members of the Czech charity People in Need, the group’s country director said.

headline.main: Gunmen in Northern Afghanistan Kill 9 Local Aid Workers
headline.print_headline: Gunmen in Afghanistan Kill 9 Local Aid Workers
